sections.intro-paragraph: Here is where you will find the projects i've been involved in, a mix of personal and student projects.

chapters.heading: Input, Processing, and Output
chapters.description: this is where we get into more complex maths. We learn to deal formulas, conversions and rounding money

exercises.name: Saying Hello
exercises.description: A program that prompts for your name and prints a greeting using your name.

exercises.name: Counting the Number of Characters
exercises.description: A program that prompts for an input string and displays the number of characters the string contains.

exercises.name: Printing Quotes
exercises.description: A program that prompts for a quote and an author and displays it

exercises.name: Mad Lib
exercises.description: A simple mad-lib program that prompts for a noun, verb, adverb, and adjective and injects them into a story.

exercises.name: Simple Math
exercises.description: A program that prompts for two numbers. and displays the sum, difference, product, and quotient of those numbers

exercises.name: Retirement Calculator
exercises.description: A program that determines how many years you have left until retirement and the year you can retire.
